title: 2DFX Smoke Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Smoke sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.


Features:


  • Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to memory capacity.
  • Optimized for games.
  • Pivot point set properly.
  • No setup or plug-ins required.
  • All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

       https://youtu.be/7lZKr5vmfWo      

Technical details:


  • File Formats: transparent Png.
  • Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.
  • 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

  • Smoke 01_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1152
  • Smoke 02_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1440
  • Smoke 03_#[512,288].png 2560 × 1728
  • Smoke 04_#[512,288].png 2560 × 1728
  • Smoke 05_#[512,288].png 2560 × 2016
  • Smoke 06_#[512,288].png 1536 × 1440
  • Smoke 07_#[512,288].png 2560 × 1728
  • Smoke 08_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1728
  • Smoke 09_#[512,288].png 2048 × 1440
  • Smoke 10_#[512,288].png 3072 × 2304


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
